Colours

Example
SE Dark orange
#BF3A27
$se-dark-orange
SE Red
#D60000
$se-red
SE Orange
#D65811
$se-orange
SE Amber
#FF9900
$se-amber
SE Yellow
#FDB813
$se-yellow
SE Bright green
#00CC00
$se-bright-green
Accessible green
#128512
$accessible-green
SE Dark green
#03634D
$se-dark-green
SE Turquoise
#00AAAD
$se-turquoise
SE Light blue
#2A7CB2
$se-light-blue
SE Blue
#00427F
$se-primary-color
SE Purple
#610E6C
$se-purple
SE Black
#2F3E44
$se-black
SE Mid Grey
#999999
$se-mid-grey
SE Light Grey
#ecf0f1
$se-light-grey
Headings
#333333
$se-dark-grey
Body Copy
#666666
$se-body-grey
Links
#00427f
$se-primary-color
Panel Headings
#ffffff
$se-white

Usage notes

The Scottish Enterprise online brand palette must be used at all times. When creating a website or application colours must be specified in hexadecimal format.
